subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marc Berthod led a 1-2 sweep for Switzerland in the World Cup giant slalom on Saturday and Bode Miller missed a gate during a treacherous first leg that 23 skiers did not complete.
snippet: Marc Berthod led a 1-2 sweep for Switzerland in the World Cup giant slalom on Saturday and Bode Miller missed a gate during a treacherous first leg that 23 skiers did not complete.
